prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with bright yellow scales and blue wings.
I want a playful Pokemon that can fly and has a friendly personality.
Generate a medium-sized Pokemon that loves to explore forests and mountains.
Make a water-resistant Pokemon that has a unique tail and cheerful demeanor.
Imagine a combat-ready dragon Pokemon that excels in aerial battles.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of adventure and strength.
Show me a Pokemon that has a mix of yellow and blue colors with a powerful presence.
